interlinear-text.item: Let's go to the orchard's shade [place]
MSK lapar. tʂa, tʂa ta boɣ soja [3]

phrase.item: You are riding and I am walking, come, let's go into the orchard.
You are a pick, I am a rubab [a lute-like instrument], come, let's go into the orchard.
You have a body, I have a vest, come, let's go into the orchard.
You have a head, I have a headscarf, come, let's go into the orchard.
You have eyes, I have eyeliner, come, let's go into the orchard.
You have eyebrows, I have eyebrow makeup [made from an herb], come, let's go into the orchard.
You have lips and I have a kiss, come, let's go into the orchard.
I am Mirzo and you are Nuqra, come, let's go into the orchard.
